display.title: Enchanter's Crystal (Epic)
display.description: Crystalised power of the world, all none attribute effects come in three tiers of power. Throwing any rarity of Enchanter's Crystals & a World Fragment (Enchantment) into an Enchanter's Crucible, will produce another random Enchanter's Crystal of the same rarity [Required: 1x Any Enchanter's Crystal 1x World Fragment (Enchantment) | Drop Craft With: Enchanter's Crucible]
